an10.10:4.1: “Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca sīlavā.
an10.10:4.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, sīlavā ca, evaṃ so tenaṅgena paripūro hoti.
an10.10:5.1: Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti sīlavā ca, no ca bahussuto bahussuto ca, no ca dhammakathiko … pe …
an10.10:5.2: dhammakathiko ca, no ca parisāvacaro parisāvacaro ca, no ca visārado parisāya dhammaṃ deseti visārado ca parisāya dhammaṃ deseti, no ca vinayadharo vinayadharo ca, no ca anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
an10.10:5.4: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
an10.10:5.6: pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, no ca dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena … pe …
an10.10:5.7: yathākammūpage satte pajānāti dibbena ca cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena … pe …
an10.10:5.8: yathākammūpage satte pajānāti, no ca āsavānaṃ khayā … pe …
an10.10:5.12: ‘kintāhaṃ saddho ca assaṃ, sīlavā ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisāvacaro ca, visārado ca parisāya dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, vinayadharo ca, anekavihitañca pubbenivāsaṃ anussareyyaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
an10.10:5.14: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussareyyaṃ, dibbena ca cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena … pe …
an10.10:5.15: yathākammūpage satte pajāneyyaṃ, āsavānañca khayā … pe …
an10.10:6.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, sīlavā ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisāvacaro ca, visārado ca parisāya dhammaṃ deseti, vinayadharo ca, anekavihitañca pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
an10.10:6.3: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, dibbena ca cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena … pe …
an10.10:6.4: yathākammūpage satte pajānāti, āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an10.10:6.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samantapāsādiko ca hoti sabbākāraparipūro cā”ti.
